heading: **Detailed 1:**
description:
Mostly sunny and hazy. Slight chance of a late-day shower or
thunderstorm in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Highs in the upper
80s and lower 90s, broad valleys in the low to mid 90s. Winds becoming
south 5 to 10 mph.

heading: **Detailed 2:**
description:
Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of showers and thunderstorms
along and west of the Greens, mainly after midnight. Lows in the upper 60s
to lower 70s, some mid 70s possible in the broad valleys west. Light winds,
variable to south, except from the south to southwest at 5 to 10 mph in the
Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: **Detailed 3:**
description:
Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers and thunderstorms; slight
chance of a severe storm in the afternoon. Very humid, with highs in the
mid to upper 80s, some lower 80s northeast and in the Adirondacks.
Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: **Detailed 4:**
description:
Areas of valley fog early, otherwise mostly sunny. Highs in the
upper 70s to lower 80s.

heading: **Detailed 5:**
description:
Variable clouds. Chance of showers, mainly south. Highs from
the mid 70s to lower 80s.
